_comment: English translations for HTML Cheat Code

html.description: HTML (HyperText Markup Language) is the standard markup language for creating web pages and web applications.

HTMLリンク.title: HTML Links
HTMLリンク.description: Various link types including email, phone, and SMS

画像タグ.title: Image Tag
画像タグ.description: Image element with lazy loading and alt attributes

テキストフォーマット.title: Text Formatting
テキストフォーマット.description: Various text emphasis and formatting tags

セクション分割.title: Section Divisions
セクション分割.description: Container elements for organizing page content: div, span, p, br, hr

HTML内のJavaScript.title: JavaScript in HTML
HTML内のJavaScript.description: Embedded script tag for JavaScript code

ドキュメント構造.title: Document Structure
ドキュメント構造.description: Semantic page layout elements: header, nav, main, footer

HTML5動画.title: HTML5 Video
HTML5動画.description: Video embedding with controls and fallback message

HTML5音声.title: HTML5 Audio
HTML5音声.description: Audio or audio stream embedding with controls

HTML5 Ruby.title: HTML5 Ruby
HTML5 Ruby.description: Ruby annotation for pronunciation guide (e.g., Chinese pronunciation)

テーブルの例.title: Table Example
テーブルの例.description: Basic table with header and body sections

フォームタグ.title: Form Tag
フォームタグ.description: Complete form collecting email, password, and checkbox inputs

ラベルタグ.title: Label Tag
ラベルタグ.description: Nested and referenced label patterns for form inputs

ラジオボタン.title: Radio Buttons
ラジオボタン.description: Select exactly one option from a group

Fieldsetタグ.title: Fieldset Tag
Fieldsetタグ.description: Grouped form elements with legend title

Datalistタグ.title: Datalist Tag
Datalistタグ.description: HTML5 predefined options for input field with autocomplete

メタタグ.title: Meta Tags
メタタグ.description: Basic metadata including charset, title, URL, description, and image

Open Graph.title: Open Graph
Open Graph.description: Social media metadata for Facebook, Instagram, Pinterest, LinkedIn

Twitter Cards.title: Twitter Cards
Twitter Cards.description: Twitter-specific metadata for shared content cards
